nodes.text: Star Wars: Forces of Destiny: Volume 4
Star Wars: Forces of Destiny: Volume 4 is the fourth TV special of the animated micro-series Star Wars: Forces of Destiny. The special was released on May 25, 2018.

The special featured new scenes of Maz Kanata introducing the shorts while trying to escape the brig of her ship after Hondo Ohnaka double-crossed her during one of their deals. Maz tricks Hondo into being trapped in her brig while Maz escapes, and then Maz decides to honors their original deal.
